translations.english: In the second month, he arrived at Chang'an.

translations.chinese: 蕭何治未央宮，立東闕、北闕、前殿、武庫、大倉。
translations.english: Xiao He had constructed the Weiyang Palace, establishing the eastern gate, northern gate, front hall, armory, and great granary.

translations.chinese: 上見其壯麗，甚怒，謂何曰：「天下 匈匈，勞苦數歲，成敗未可知，是何治宮室過度也！」
translations.english: The emperor saw its grandeur and was greatly angry. He said to He: "The world is in turmoil, we have labored bitterly for several years, success or failure is not yet known. Why have you constructed palace rooms excessively!"

translations.chinese: 何曰：「天下方未定，故可因以就宮室。
translations.english: He said: "The world is not yet settled, so it is suitable to take advantage of this to complete the palace rooms.

translations.chinese: 且夫天子以四海為家，非令壯麗亡以重威，且亡令後世有以加也。」
translations.english: Moreover, the Son of Heaven takes the four seas as home. If not grand, there is no way to increase authority. And if not grand, future generations will have nothing to add."
